scripts.register-login-setting: node test-registration.js --color && node test-login.js --color && node test-setting.js --color
scripts.pw-email-notif: node test-forgot-password.js --color && node test-change-mail.js --color && node test-notification.js --color
scripts.test-all: npm run register-login-setting && npm run pw-email-notif && npm run service-delete-account
